super_ultra_rare.name: §d超究極大歐派黑金弒神王者
super_ultra_rare.item: netherite_pickaxe{display:{Name:'[{"text":"超究極大歐派黑金弒神王者","italic":false,"color":"yellow"},{"text":"","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"比黑色更黑 比黑暗更暗的漆黑","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"在此寄託吾真紅的金光吧","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"覺醒之時的到來 荒謬教會的墮落章理","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"化作無形的扭曲而顯現吧","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"Explosion!!!!!","italic":false,"color":"red"}]']},Enchantments:[{id:efficiency,lvl:10},{id:fortune,lvl:10},{id:unbreaking,lvl:10},{id:mending,lvl:1}]} 1

super_ultra_rare.name: §d超究極大歐派黑金狂砂亂舞
super_ultra_rare.item: netherite_axe{display:{Name:'[{"text":" ","italic":false},{"text":"超究極大歐派黑金狂砂亂舞","color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"","italic":false}]','[{"text":"隱藏著黑暗力量的鑰匙啊!!","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"在我面前顯示出你真正的力量","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"與你定下約定的大歐派神命令你","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"封印解除!!","italic":false,"color":"red"}]']},Enchantments:[{id:efficiency,lvl:10},{id:fortune,lvl:10},{id:sharpness,lvl:10},{id:unbreaking,lvl:10},{id:mending,lvl:1}]} 1

super_ultra_rare.name: §d超究極大歐派黑金神語聖劍
super_ultra_rare.item: netherite_sword{display:{Name:'[{"text":"超究極大歐派黑金神語聖劍","italic":false,"color":"yellow"},{"text":"","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"既然你誠心誠意的發問了！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"我們就大發慈悲的告訴你！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"為了防止世界被破壞！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"為了守護世界的和平！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"貫徹愛與真實的邪惡！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"可愛又迷人的反派角色！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"武藏！小次郎！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"我們是穿梭在銀河的大歐派艦隊","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"白洞！白色的明天在等著我們！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"就是這樣～喵！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]']},Enchantments:[{id:bane_of_arthropods,lvl:10},{id:smite,lvl:10},{id:sharpness,lvl:10},{id:fire_aspect,lvl:10},{id:knockback,lvl:10},{id:looting,lvl:10},{id:sweeping,lvl:10},{id:unbreaking,lvl:10},{id:mending,lvl:1}]} 1

super_ultra_rare.name: §d超究極大歐派黑金宝鐘マリン
super_ultra_rare.item: netherite_hoe{Damage:0,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Amount:12,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.attack_damage",UUID:[I;-121515,6561,203740,-13122]},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Amount:2,Slot:mainhand,Name:"generic.attack_speed",UUID:[I;-121515,6661,203740,-13322]}],display:{Name:'[{"text":" ","italic":false},{"text":"超究極大歐派黑金宝鐘マリン","color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"","italic":false}]','[{"text":"海賊なら Yo-Ho! 踊れ叫べ Yo-Ho!","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"さぁ今旗のもとへ","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"宝鐘海賊団「出航～！」","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"踊る Ahoy! に見る Ahoy! ホイホーイ！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy! ホイホイホーイ！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"「全速前進だ〜！」","italic":false,"color":"red"}]']},Enchantments:[{id:efficiency,lvl:10},{id:fortune,lvl:10},{id:sharpness,lvl:10},{id:unbreaking,lvl:10},{id:mending,lvl:1}]} 1

super_ultra_rare.name: §d超究極大歐派黑金月夜雕刻者
super_ultra_rare.item: netherite_shovel{display:{Name:'[{"text":"超究極大歐派黑金月夜雕刻者","italic":false,"color":"yellow"},{"text":"","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"一袋米要扛幾樓 一袋米要扛二樓","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"一袋米我給多了 一袋米我洗了","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"一袋米我洗了那麼多泥 好多泥阿","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"我挖坑扔 口口有泥","italic":false,"color":"red"}]','[{"text":"誰給你一袋米呦 神羅天征！","italic":false,"color":"red"}]']},Enchantments:[{id:efficiency,lvl:10},{id:fortune,lvl:10},{id:unbreaking,lvl:10},{id:mending,lvl:1}]} 1

ultra_rare.name: §c超跑情人夢
ultra_rare.item: enchanted_book{display:{Name:'[{"text":"超跑情人夢","italic":false,"color":"red"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"轟隆隆隆 隆隆隆隆衝衝衝衝 拉風 引擎發動 引擎發動+++","italic":false,"color":"yellow","bold":true}]']},Enchantments:[{id:soul_speed,lvl:3}]} 1

rare.item: potion{CustomPotionColor:16759552,display:{Name:'[{"text":"大歐派藥水之超究極速快感．EX","italic":false,"color":"yellow"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"無駄無駄無駄無駄無駄無駄無駄無駄無駄無駄無駄","italic":false,"color":"red"}]']},CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:8,Duration:24000,Amplifier:5},{Id:1,Duration:24000,Amplifier:5}]} 1

common.name: §d貓與歐派
common.item: book{display:{Name:'[{"text":"貓與歐派","italic":false,"color":"red"}]',Lore:['[{"text":"歐派與貓","italic":false}]','[{"text":"想要哪一個？","italic":false}]','[{"text":"小孩子才做選擇！","italic":false}]','[{"text":"兩個都給我打包起來！","italic":false}]']}} 1
